title: Here On Out
lyrics:
Out of the corner of my eye
Caught you walk by
I chase you down
Is it ok if I call you mine
From here on out

As if I could ever stop



You are light as a butterfly

As heavy as a rock

[?] the towel



Is it ok if I call you mine

From here on out

As if I could ever stop



And now I'm opened up

I'm strong I'm wild

Like a storm out the stars

In my blood

And it's all because of you

You, my love



Is it ok if I call you mine

From here on out

As if I could ever stop



When you laugh, it's like a lie

To fill me up

'Cause you are my love

And when I fell into your eyes

I could not get out

And I could not get enough



Is it ok if I call you mine

From here on out

As if I could ever stop



And now I'm opened up

I'm strong I'm wild

Like a storm out the stars

In my blood

And it's all because of you

You are my love



Is it ok if I call you mine

From here on out

As if I could ever stop



And I want you to know

I still need you so

I want you to know

And I still need you so



Is it ok if I call you mine

From here on out

As if I could ever stop
